dcterms:creator: X. Hu
H. Chen
S. Liu
H. Jiang
G. Chu
R. Li
dcterms:description: The dataset contains the CDR data of 6,106 users from 23 cities in a large province of China, spanning from August 2019 to March 2020, where the node features are extracted from the features of user behavior records, and the edges are constructed based on the similarity of the node features. All samples contain two classes: fraudsters and non-fraudsters.
dcterms:title: Sichuan

dcterms:creator: M. Liu
J. Liao
J. Wang
Q. Qi
dcterms:description: The dataset includes CDR data for one week from users in a Chinese city. The author extracted features from the raw CDR data and created connected edges based on user communication behavior. The dataset contains 3 categories.
dcterms:title: BUPT
